TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because.

how do i make a rocket?

With many BOOSTAHS.

Who is the "God" of the Kerbal universe?

Whackjob.

Why aren't there any female kerbals?

Answering that question may cause an inferno. Only you can prevent flame wars!

Why do humans find anything offensive besides direct insults?

42!

Why dogs don't talk?

Because they would blow our minds with hidden profoundness.

Can you ride your bicycle with no handlebars? With no handlebars?

what are handlebars? handlebars?

what are handlebars?

A type of moustache.

Why?

Why not?

How?

Yes.

When?

Now.

Who?

Some random words to fulfil the VBulletin rules, ignore that....

Sorry I don't speak owl.

Does anyone here speak owl?

woo hoo hoo woo.

Est-ce que il y a quelqu'un de France? (Is there anybody from France?)
They're all on the ISS obviously! All french live on the ISS

Purple.

Why is greenhouse not green?

How to make It work: shave yourself with an antimatter chainsaw. Newb.

How do I get a nuke?

By becoming an US president.

How does one become an US president?

By becoming the US Vice President before the President dies in office.

How does one become the US Vice President?

By convincing a bunch of republicans that you're worth their money, or a bunch of democrats that you will not obstruct the president.

How does one convince a bunch of stupid people (I clearly don't bump into US government) about something?

Shove a telephone pole up your ass... Duh.

How do you get a telephone pole?

Travel back in time and steal it from A.G.Bell.

How does one ask a stupid question?

Tape a sandwich to your table.

How do you nuke all of China?

By avoiding saying you're going to blow up China. First rule of genre-savvy villainy: Don't tell the hero you're master plan!

What is the likelihood that some NSA dude is reading this post right now?

No, he's reading this post wrong now.

How did they get to a galaxy far, far away to shoot the Star-Wars films???

Kraken drive.

How can I convince my wife we need a gaming PC?
